content: {"name": "Christian Community Church-Extended Hand", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Offer a men only homeless shelter.\n- Offer a cooling station in the summer that provides cold water and snacks.", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "275 Holeman Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Mt Holly", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08060", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9897, "longitude": -74.8}, "phones": [{"number": "(609) 914-4270", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
